snippet: Mrs. Cole, a jazz singer, was performing in Harlem when she met her husband.
abstract: Maria Cole, a jazz singer who performed with Count Basie and Duke Ellington in the 1940s and who was married to Nat King Cole for 17 years until his death in 1965, dies at age 89.
lead_paragraph: Mrs. Cole, a jazz singer, was performing in Harlem when she met her husband.

headline.seo: Maria Cole, Jazz Singer and Wife of Nat, Dies at 89
headline.main: Maria Cole, Singer and Wife of Nat King Cole, Dies at 89
headline.print_headline: Maria Cole, 89, Singer and Wife of Nat King Cole
